title: Five-Star Boutique New Zealand Escape
description: Leave the rest of the world behind with three nights of high-end boutique luxury at The Boatshed on New Zealand’s Waiheke Island. With six unique and private accommodation options to choose from you can tailor-make your holiday to your liking and enjoy daily breakfasts made using the freshest local produce, one-day jeep hire to explore the surrounding dirt tracks and rugged coastline, local wine and a cheese board, and a food and beverage credit.
offer_address: Tawa and Huia Street, Oneroa, Auckland 1081, New Zealand

vendor_name: (CLOSED) Enclosure Bay - Small Luxury Hotel (this is now a private residential home)
title: Award-Winning Waiheke Island Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description:
Leave the rest of the world behind for a tranquil escape at Enclosure Bay, a boutique retreat perched on the northern coast of Waiheke Island. A winner in the TripAdvisor Travellers' Choice Awards 2020, this ultra-private property boasts gorgeous views over the Hauraki Gulf and just three exclusive rooms to choose from, setting the stage for a blissful escape from reality on the serene island of Waiheke. A true foodie paradise, this cherished destination is blessed with award-winning restaurants, renowned wineries, fine local produce and breathtaking natural beauty.

Enjoy daily à la carte breakfast with a view served in the privacy of your room, a bottle of local wine and a cheese platter on arrival and complimentary return transfers to the property from Waiheke Island's ferry terminal.
offer_address: 9 Great Barrier Road, Oneroa, Waiheke Island 1081, Auckland City, New Zealand

title: Secluded Romantic Waiheke Island Villas with Daily Breakfast & Private Beach
description:
Escape to the idyllic Omana Luxury Villa - Waiheke Island's hidden gem for romance and indulgent luxury. Situated on over seven acres of lush natural environment, this boutique retreat feels a world away from Auckland but is just a 20-minute drive and 35-minute ferry from the glittering CBD. Sink into relaxation mode as you splash at your private beach, laze the days away reading a good book and bask in the sun. Soak in your oversized freestanding bathtub overlooking the peaceful bay or simply use your villa as a launchpad to explore the region.

Beyond your villa, Waiheke Island is a playground of possibilities. Within a five-minute drive, you'll find some of the region’s most beautiful beaches and an abundance of walking and cycling tracks, as well as world-class wineries and eateries known for their scrumptious paddock to-plate dishes.
offer_address: 379D Gordons Road, Waiheke Island 1971, New Zealand

title: Tranquil Winery Getaway on Beautiful Waiheke Island
description: Dreaming of a picturesque escape with good wine, good food and good company? At Mudbrick Luxury Cottages, you will find all that and more. Located on the breathtaking Waiheke Island, these luxury cottages boast the elegant décor of a bygone era, so you’ll feel like you’re a world away from your everyday life. With the acclaimed Mudbrick Winery and Restaurant on site, you will be treated to daily à la carte breakfast, a cellar door wine tasting and a welcome bottle of Mudbrick wine on arrival.
offer_address: 126 Church Bay Rd, Waiheke Island, Oneroa 1971, New Zealand
